Episode Title: Can You Start a YouTube Channel in 2023? With Cleo Abram
Subtitle: Marques, Andrew, and David pull headlines out of. a hat and discuss the news as they go.
Description: This week, we brought back "Headlines in a Hat" so that Marques, Andrew, and David could discuss the news of the week at random. They discuss stormproof routers, Google using AI to summarize websites, the new Youtube Samples feature from YouTube Music, and even a TV that LG made which you can carry with you in a suitcase. Then we wrap it all up with trivia answers.
